     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10252314">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10252314">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10252314">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10252314">
          <div id="boxatt10252314" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12716687">
              <a id="link_12716687" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://histories.cambridge.org/uid=1931/collection?id=cat_religious_studies" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12716687,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion Studies', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12716687}); ">
               Cambridge History of Christianity
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A broad history of Christianity, in both the East and the West.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12716694">
              <a id="link_12716694" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://histories.cambridge.org/uid=1931/collection?id=cat_religious_studies" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12716694,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion Studies', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12716694}); ">
               Cambridge History of Islam
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Cambridge History of Islam is the most comprehensive and ambitious collaborative survey of Islamic history and civilisation yet to appear in English.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12716787">
              <a id="link_12716787" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://histories.cambridge.org/uid=1931/collection?id=cat_religious_studies" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12716787,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion Studies', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12716787}); ">
               Cambridge History of Judaism
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Treats the major historical, political and cultural developments in Jewish history and the history of Judaism.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12716619">
              <a id="link_12716619" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://histories.cambridge.org/uid=1931/collection?id=cat_religious_studies" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12716619,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion Studies', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12716619}); ">
               Cambridge History of the Bible
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Cambridge History treats the Bible as a central document of Western civilization, a source of exegesis and of doctrine, an influence on education, on the growth of scholarship, on art and literature, as well as on the liturgy and the life of the Christian church and its members.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20982713">
              <a id="link_20982713" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20982713,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion Studies', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25494987">
              <a id="link_25494987" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/764567613?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25494987,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion Studies', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25494987}); ">
               Encyclopaedia of Judaism
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Purports to provide a full and reliable account of Judaism, beginning in ancient Israelite times and extending to our own day.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link13331149">
              <a id="link_13331149" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;res_id=info%3Asid%2Fgale%3AGVRL&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi%2Ffmt:kev:mtx:journal&amp;rft.isbn=9780028659107&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:oclc.org:mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(13331149,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion Studies', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13331149}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Buddhism
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This encyclopedia describes the Buddhist world view, basic teachings and practices of Buddhism, as well as its different schools and sects. In addition to containing entries on Buddhist scriptures, art, architecture, divinities, monastic orders, festivals, rites and ceremonies, this 2-vol. set explores the history of Buddhism, the different forms it has taken in different parts of the world, and how Buddhism has blended with other religions.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12716850">
              <a id="link_12716850" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/5BSX" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12716850,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion Studies', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12716850}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The second edition of a resource that is considered a standard reference in the field. Presents a cross-cultural approach that emphasizes religion's role within everyday life and as a unique experience from culture to culture. The original 2,750 entries have been retained, many heavily updated, and approximately 600 entirely new articles have been added by an international team of scholars and contributors.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12716866">
              <a id="link_12716866" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/436848559?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12716866,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion Studies', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12716866}); ">
               New Encyclopedia of Judaism
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A comprehensive one-volume encyclopedia that accessibly presents every aspect of the Jewish religion and represents current thinking among scholars in the Reform, Conservative, and Orthodox movements.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile2922925" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">
        <div class="roundbox headerbox">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <h2>
             Subject Guide
            </h2>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </div>
        <div class="roundbox innerboxprofile" style="padding:5px;">

          <tr>
           <td>
            <div class="profile_image_box" id="profile_image_box_63914">

             </a>
             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Kelly Cannon
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="profileh4">
